trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Quincy
There were no other sightings in Quincy on or around September 28th 2011
Summary: Past few weeks what appears to be a very bright star will appear in the sky around 9 p.m.It will ascend.descend and move across the sky all the while flickering radically .Appears as orange orbs on camera and tonight blue orbs appear on film. .
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the second fall that we have seen this ufo. It will appear around 9 p.m. in the east very low to ground.It will move up ,down and side to side and always seems to relocate to the same vicinity. Often small blinker-esque objects will appear to interact with the object. When photographed and zoomed in on 2 large orange orbs appear .They seem to be overlapped in the center.Tonight when photographed the object appears to be zig- zagging wildly around and shooting off a series of 4 smaller balls of blue lights. This has been visible on most clear nights in our area .I will attach photos soon.Ringing of the ears has occurred when viewing object and it has been also known to drain batteries that are fully charged .
